title: Her Filthy Professor
description: What happens when a smolderingly hot millionaire meets an innocent rule follower who brings out his filthy side?DaisyI was the girl who never broke the rules and did something wild and crazy - until my sister's wedding.Now I've had the most sinful night of my life with a dirty-talking bad boy. Guess who's my newest professor.AlexanderThe only thing that made my cousin's wedding bearable was one of the bridesmaids.And our night together was as filthy as they come. But when the sun came up, she'd ghosted me.Until Monday morning, when I found her in the front row of my calculus class.The road to hell is paved with bad intentions, and I'm in the driver's seat.Her Filthy Professor is a standalone, forced proximity, forbidden, insta-attraction contemporary romance with all the swooning and steam you can handle.
author: Alexia Chase
